name: Pro Pinball Timeshock
description:
Prepare yourself for total assault of a multi-layered adventure in vision and sound through four different time zones. Experience gleaming Silicon Graphics that test your capabilities to the limit.

Pro Pinball- Timshock! Brings you full 3D pinball table on screen with a specially recorded soundtrack by Bruce Foxton and Jake Burns of Stiff Little Fingers. The table is so detailed you'll even think you can see your reflection in the careering ball and gleaming metal fittings. This is the most complex, rewarding, frustrating and entertaining experience ever.A challenging and well-designed table with lots of score-boosting quests Fun and addictive gameplay for both the casual gamer and the pinball professional Highly detailed pre-rendered graphics and realistic physics
